author: Brock Murley
comment: I really like it. Just one thing, can you add the ability to have your phone battery show on the face?

reply.author: PiFox Lab
reply.content:
Hi Brock, 
It is not possible for the standalone wear application to pull the phone battery data on its own.

You might need to install 3rd party data provider for it to work.
We are sorry to disappoint you....

Have a nice day.

author: Adam Pecoraro
comment: Great first start with this new app. I'd like to see the seconds scroll smoothly as well as additional options for displaying time, such as the option to move minutes and seconds to the center.
